entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Sachigo Lake
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of snow. Temperature rising to minus 1 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Periods of snow beginning this evening. Risk of freezing drizzle before morning. Amount 5 cm. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 this evening then becoming west 20 gusting to 40 after midnight. Temperature rising to minus 1 by morning. Wind chill minus 12 this evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of snow. Temperature falling to minus 19 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Risk of freezing drizzle early in the morning. Local amount 2 cm. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature falling to minus 19 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 7 in the morning and minus 25 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 29.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light after midnight. Low minus 29. Wind chill minus 25 in the evening and minus 40 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 23.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 23. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 13 February 2023
